features.name: User Authentication & Smart Login
features.description: Multi-tenant login system with email conflict resolution, RBAC-based permissions in JWT, and refresh tokens.

features.name: Order Management & State Machine
features.description: Complete order lifecycle from creation to delivery, using a state machine for transitions. Supports multiple delivery types (dine-in, takeaway, delivery).

features.name: Inventory stock control (FIFO)
features.description: Automatic stock deduction for ingredients and products during sales. Supports recipe-based deduction and modifiers.

features.name: Cash Management & Closures
features.description: Register opening/closing with expected vs real total tracking and automatic difference calculation.

features.name: Security & Audit Logging
features.description: Comprehensive audit of RBAC actions and security events (login failures, significant cash differences).
